<h1 align="center">
  DeepHire Landing Pages
</h1>

https://www.loom.com/share/684ae99235f940e8b5d676d8a9872f5d @steven

### Run project

```
git clone https://github.com/RusseII/deephire-homepage.git
cd deephire-homepage
yarn
yarn start
```
###
How to make changes 
Use https://landing.ant.design/edit/ to edit the pages on antd landing


Here are the doc with all of our pages - https://docs.google.com/document/u/2/d/1aAuHlzA1j34vK5aDY1dnzZPc2CohUSGd-HmAcey1teE/edit
